    • Method Detail

      • readInitialData

        public Club readInitialData()
        This method create Club with the info. pre: The user has to enter the club's name, nit, date, and the names of the 2 teams. post: The data will be saved.

      • showMenu

        public void showMenu()
        This method shows the options in a menu. pre: The user has to create the club with all the info needed. post: The menu will be shown.

      • readOption

        public int readOption()
        This method saves the option choosen by the user. pre: The user has to enter a number between 1 and 10. post: The option will be save.

      • readPlayer

        public java.lang.String readPlayer()
        This method creates the new player. pre: The user has to enter a name, id, salary, status, the number of the tshirt, the number of goals made, an average calification and a position. post: The data will be saved, and the new player will be hired.

      • readMainCoach

        public java.lang.String readMainCoach()
        This method creates the new main coach. pre: The user has to enter a name, id, salary, status, years of experience, number of teams in charge in all their career and the number of championships that they have won post: The data will be saved, and the new main coach will be hired.

      • readTecAssistant

        public java.lang.String readTecAssistant()
        This method create the new technical assistant. pre: he user has to enter a name, id, salary, status and years of experience, their professional experience as a player or not and an expertise post: The data will be saved, and the new technical assistant will be hired.

      • doOeration

        public void doOeration(int choice)
        This method does what the user has choosen. pre: The user has to choose an option post: It will do what the user want
        Parameters:
        choice - it is the choice of the user. 1 < choice < 11

      • startProgram

        public void startProgram()
        This method groups all the methods needed to make the program work. pre: All the preconditions for the others methods altogether. post: It saves the results of all the methods to show them in the Main.
